text: Mayfield is a small farming settlement in the Ashburton District, New Zealand. It is situated 35 kilometers west of Ashburton and 34 kilometers north of Geraldine. It has a primary school and the store was burnt down in early 2008 but reopened in early 2009. It is within the Geraldine and Ashburton high school zone. == References == Category:Settlements in Canterbury Region Category:Ashburton District
title: Mayfield, Canterbury
